message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced split that accounts for the time pressure.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was quite generous. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I still think I deserve the larger share.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer.  It's a reasonable compromise considering the inflation.
